title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not available.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, either both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Navigator module.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Verify that the Open Project menu item is available and the Close Project menu item is not available.
